name: Nindo unofficial plugin
description: This is the unofficial Nindo plugin. You can click on the plugin icon to get to the artist's Nindo page. We plan to support the following sites: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter and Twitch. Unfortunately only Twitter is supported at the moment. If you found a bug, feel free to report it on GitHub. I am happy about every contributor. This project is licensed under the MIT license. For more information, visit https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.
